LABEL_MGMT.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Labels

Labeling conversations or contacts is like giving them colored folders â€“ an easy way to organize and find them later. Just use the 'Conversation Actions' menu while chatting to label a conversation. The labels will also appear on the secondary sidebar of the 'Conversations' or 'Contacts' tab for quick filtering.

You can manage your existing labels from this page or create new ones using the 'Add label' button.

Open the Labels handbook in another tab for a helping hand.
